department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Tutorial - Senior Year (Thesis/Senior Project)
course.faculty_text: Ruth S. Lingford and members of the Department
course.description: All students wishing to undertake a VES 99 project must have permission of the project adviser before being considered. The Director of Undergraduate Studies must approve all VES 99 projects and all theses must be approved by the VES Honors Board in advance.
course.notes: Optional for senior concentrators. Letter-graded only. Students must be enrolled in VES 99 to do a thesis. Students should arrange regular tutorial meetings with their project adviser. Senior theses and projects are led by individual faculty members; however study cards should be signed by the Director of Undergraduate Studies.
